ygData.subject: Re: fight on
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry. Sleep deprivation is an ugly thing. And both Prowl and IR are 20+ feet tall. ... Prowl roars as he feels Menasor hit the ground, both him and Iron

Sorry. Sleep deprivation is an ugly thing. And both Prowl and IR are 
20+ feet tall.

::Prowl/Iron Raptor/Firearm::

Prowl roars as he feels Menasor hit the ground, both him and Iron 
Raptor ending up on top of the gestalt. Prowl lifts one foot, 
smashing it down on one side of Menasor's back while Iron Raptor does 
the same on the other side, both bots digging the claws of their free 
legs into Menasor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Menasor's grab gets Firearm's leg, pulling him down as Menasor falls. 
The impact of the fall shakes through Firearm, his leg snapping off 
with a sickening crunch. The Maximal falls backwards, his jetpack 
launching him back into the air, his head clear now but the stump of 
his leg leaking fluid rapidly.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Yanshosh, you must of missed Menasors attack on Firearm, he 
shot at
> him again. Also ,how big are IR and Prowl in the modes they are in.
> 
> BIC:
> Menasor was still staring at his target. He didnt notice someong 
leaping at
> him. As they grabbed his legs from behind he started to 
stumble, "Who
> challenges Menasor" he yells, the voice booming around that area. 
Then the
> second robot grabs him, and he starts to fall forward, "NO" he 
screams as
> all 45 feet of metalic monster falls forward towards the rest of the
> battling robots. His body becomes grounded, hitting the earth very 
hard,
> causing huge rifts in the earth to go outwards. He lays motionless, 
close
> to Firearm, and the rest of the battling factions.
